form.description: Interact with a web page by clicking and typing via its user interface.
form.metadata: click enter text ui bot type fill form data loop
form.name: First Message

description: Repeat for each item in another step's data.
params.name: Loop through data

description: Enter the time, in seconds, to show tooltips. Enter 0 for no tooltip.
params.name: Show tooltips

form.description: Instruct the bot to go to a new page.
form.name: Go to page

description: Enter a URL to go to. You can also plugin data from other steps to provide a URL. Enter (skip) to skip this step.
params.name: Enter URL

description: Check the box to stop Axiom retrieving session data from this URL's localstorage. This will prevent an extra page refresh but can prevent your session from loading fully.
params.name: Do not share localstorage

description: Check the box to open the URL in a new browser tab, the automation will automatically switch to running in the new tab.
params.name: Open in new tab

form.description: Instruct the bot to click on a button, link, or any other clickable thing.
form.name: Anti Captcha

description: Click 'Select' to choose what the bot should click on.

help.name: Updated Single Selector Tool with new custom selector feature -

params.name: Select

description: Toggle off to perform a left click; toggle on to perform a right click.
params.name: Left click | Right click

description: If checked & the selected element is not present on the page the automation will continue without an error.
params.name: Optional click

form.description: Instruct the bot to click on a button, link, or any other clickable thing.
form.name: Question

form.description: Instruct the bot to enter some text into a field.
form.name: Inviami dei messaggi anonimiâ€¦

description: Click 'Select' to choose the text field that the bot should enter text into. If you do not select a field, the bot will type into whatever is selected by default.

help.name: Updated Single Selector Tool with new custom selector feature -

params.name: Select text field

value.targetElement: <textarea placeholder='Inviami dei messaggi anonimiâ€¦' name='question' autocomplete='off' maxlength='300' id='question' class='axiom-matched axiom-sel-selected-0'></textarea>

description: Delay between each key press in miliseconds.
params.name: Delay

description: Toggle on to skip clearing the text before entering. The value will be appended to whatever is already in the box.
params.name: Append to existing

description: Record a sequence of characters to use instead of enter for line breaks. For example, record shift and enter for Instagram DMs.
params.name: Custom line break

form.description: Finish and trigger the bot's run!
form.name: Finish Interact with the UI

form.description: Jump to a different step, use to create branches and loops.
form.name: Jump to another step

description: Enter the number of the step to jump to if the value is found. You cannot jump to sub steps, only whole steps.
params.name: Jump to step

description: Maximum number of times this step should trigger in a single run.
params.name: Maximum cycles
